snippet: The four-time graded stakes winner Caixa Eletronica collided on the training track with Six Drivers, who was running loose after dumping his rider.
abstract: Four-time graded stakes winner Caixa Eletronica and another horse die after a training accident at Belmont Park..
lead_paragraph: The four-time graded stakes winner Caixa Eletronica collided on the training track with Six Drivers, who was running loose after dumping his rider.

headline.main: Two Horses Die at Belmont in Training Accident
